entries.text: ##You're cold, and you've no place to go.
##So run home, sweet child, run home.
##You know, you've no place to go, you are mine, sweet child, all mine.
##You know, you've no place to go, you are mine, sweet child, all mine.
##What have you done with him! Give him back!
##Where have you hidden him? My dear, sweet child!
##Ahh, where have you gone, sweet child...
